1.content: One day when it's thunder and lightning outside you sit down to watch the t.v when all of a sudden you're satellite antenna is hit by a bolt of lightning. A new show comes up which shows you watching telly. It says that you can now enter any t.v show or movie as an existing character or a new character. You sit for a moment and think this could be a really cool power. But first are you male or female?
1.title: The Beginning

11.content: You are a 16 year old boy brought up by your widower father who recently died. You were currently being looked after by your 80 year old grandmother who wouldn't know if you were coming or going. Life was just going downhill and this would be the perfect way to get away from it all. But if you do it what show are you going to go in?
11.title: Male

111.content: You decide that if you're going to try this power out than you should go somewhere you can gamble and have a lap-dance any day of the week. You then look at the telly and think as hard as you can about the show Las Vegas. You suddenly feel a strange power surrounding you. Suddenly pain shoots through you as your body morphs. But into who?
111.title: Las Vegas

info.brief_description: Hop into any programme and do what you want.
info.description:
One day when it's thunder and lightning outside you sit down to watch the t.v when all of a sudden you're satellite antenna is hit by a bolt of lightning. A new programme comes up which shows you watching telly. It says that you can now enter any t.v programme or movie as an existing character or a new character. How do you use this power? You decide!

-No vore
-no gay sex
-keep to the basic outline of the show you are in

Other than that anything goes. Enjoy!
